name: DEVOUR THE FLESH
description:
DEVOUR

THE

FLESH

A rogue-like about sacrifice!
To all who stand in your way... their life is but currency for your ascension to Godhood!

---

Made for the Ludum Dare 44 Jam by

Brandon Yu (me)

Zenson Ng

Theme was "Your life is currency"
